FuncDef: This command enables the forwarding adjacency feature. With this feature, IS-IS or OSPF advertises an RSVP LSP as a link so that other routers in the network can include it in their SPF computations. The RSVP LSP is advertised as an unnumbered point-to-point link and the link LSP/LSA has no Traffic Engineering opaque sub-TLVs per RFC 3906.
